attributes.action: Remove Andy Townsend from his job as co-commentator for ITV football
attributes.additional_details:
I wish to get Andy Townsend removed from his current co-commentator position with ITV football.
He regularly ruins our enjoyment with his negativity, biased opinions and incorrect facts.
We, the public, have endured this for too many years and it needs sorting.
To be honest ITV should not be allowed to show football anyway, don't get me started on Chiles.
